extension.title: Claude Code Chat
extension.description: Beautiful Claude Code Chat Interface for VS Code

wslAlert.title: Looks like you are using Windows!
wslAlert.message: If you are using WSL to run Claude Code, you should enable WSL integration in the settings.

input.placeholder: Type your message to Claude Code...

modelSelector.title: Enforce Model
modelSelector.explanation: This overrides your default model setting for this conversation only.

opus.title: Opus - Most capable model
opus.description: Best for complex tasks and highest quality output

sonnet.title: Sonnet - Balanced model
sonnet.description: Good balance of speed and capability

default.title: Default - User configured
default.description: Uses the model configured in your settings

thinkingIntensity.title: Thinking Mode Intensity
thinkingIntensity.description: Configure the intensity of thinking mode. Higher levels provide more detailed reasoning but consume more tokens.

customCommands.title: Custom Commands
customCommands.description: Custom slash commands for quick prompt access. Click to use directly in chat.

builtinCommands.title: Built-in Commands
builtinCommands.description: These commands require the Claude CLI and will open in VS Code terminal. Return here after completion.

wsl.title: WSL Configuration
wsl.description: WSL integration allows you to run Claude Code from within Windows Subsystem for Linux. This is useful if you have Claude installed in WSL instead of Windows.
wsl.nodePathHelper: Find your node installation path in WSL by running:
wsl.claudePathHelper: Find your claude installation path in WSL by running:

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: Manage commands and tools that are automatically allowed without asking for permission.

addForm.selectToolHint: Select a tool to add always-allow permission.
addForm.bashHint: Use patterns like "npm i *" or "git add *" for specific commands.
addForm.toolHint: This will allow all {tool} commands without asking for permission.

status.ready: Ready to chat with Claude Code! Type your message below.

messages.loginRequired:
üîê Login Required

Your Claude API key is invalid or expired.
A terminal has been opened - please run the login process there.

After logging in, come back to this chat to continue.
messages.configChanged: ‚öôÔ∏è WSL configuration changed. Started a new session.
messages.yoloModeEnabled: ‚ö° YOLO Mode enabled! All future permissions will be automatically allowed.
messages.terminalOpened: Check the terminal to update your default model configuration. Come back to this chat here after making changes.
messages.slashCommandExecuted: Executing /{command} command in terminal. Check the terminal output and return when ready.

permissions.title: Permission Required
permissions.message: Allow {tool} to execute the tool call above?

decided.alwaysAllowed: You allowed this and set it to always allow

permissions.suggestion: üí° This looks like a permission issue. You can enable Yolo Mode to skip all permission checks.

ui.yoloWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Yolo Mode Active: Claude Code will auto-approve all tool requests.
